title: Aztec Sacrifice
author: RiotManiack
pages:
The Aztec's believed
that by sacrficing
their own (mainly
young woman), they
would appease the
sun god Tonahtiua,
and he would rise
each day. To me its
like they thought that
they were golding up
the sun.


This build represents
the hands of the
Aztects holding up
their temples which in
turn held up the sun.








Also yes, I know er
are not where the
Aztecs's lived.
